Text.Language: Gabri/l piaggeloc afhisennoufi n~]paryenoc: je ,ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ouoh P[oic sop neme.
Gabriel the angel announced glad tidings to the Virgin, saying, “Hail, O full of grace, the Lord is with you.”
غبريال الملاك بشر العذراء قائلا افرحي يا ممتلئة نعمة الرب معك
Teraerboki ouoh n~temici n~ous/ri: eue~mou] e~pefran je I/couc: acerouw n~je ]cabe: petehnak P[oic marefswpi
You will conceive and give birth to a Son, His name shall be called Jesus,” so the wise (one) answered, “Your will Lord, let it be.”
ستحبلين وتلدين ابنا ويدعي اسمه يسوع. فأجابت الحكيمة لتكن مشيئتك يارب
All/louia All/louia All/louia Pimici e~bol qen v~iwt qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Who was born of the Father before all the ages, save us and have mercy upon us.
الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا المولود من الآب قبل كل الدهور خلصنا وارحمنا.

Comment.Language: Another Watos Aspasmos for the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Piaggeloc eyouab Gabri/l: afhisennoufi n~]paryenoc: menenca piacpacmoc aftajro m~moc qen pefcaji
The holy angel Gabriel announced glad tidings to the Virgin. Upon greeting her, he strenghthed her by his word.
الملاك المقدس غبريال بشر العذراء وبعد السلام قواها بقوله:
Je m~pererho] Mariam arejimi gar n~ouh~mot: qaten V] h/ppe gar teraerboki: ouoh n~temici n~ous/ri All/louia All/louia All/louia
Saying, “Fear not Mary, for you found grace before God. For behold You will conceive and give birth to a Son.” Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia.
لا تخافي يا مريم لأنك قد وجدت نعمة عند الله، ها انت ستحبلين وتلدين إبناً: الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا
Pi,~rictoc pimici e~bol qen v~iwt qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Christ, the begotten of the Father before all the ages, save us and have mercy upon us.
أيها المسيح المولود من الآب قبل كل الدهور خلصنا وارحمنا.

Comment.Language: A Third Watos Aspasmos for the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: Ouoh Za,ariac piou/b: n~yok akhisennoufi naf: qen p~jinmici m~pip~rodromoc: Iwann/c piref]wmc.
You announced glad tidings to Zacharias the priest of the birth of the forerunner, John the Baptist.
وزكريا الكاهن، أنتَ بشرته بميلاد السابق، يوحنا المعمدان.
All/louia All/louia All/louia Pimici e~bol qen v~iwt qajwou n~nie~wn t/rou: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Who was born of the Father before all the ages, save us and have mercy upon us.
الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا المولود من الآب قبل كل الدهور خلصنا وارحمنا.
